name: Hardware Stores
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell a full range of hardware supplies for purchase by
the general public. Products for sale may include small ticket
electrical supplies, wiring, nuts, bolts, nails, screws, hammers,
screwdrivers and other small tools, washers, keys, lights bulbs,
brackets, and plumbing supplies.
For large warehouse or discount home supply store chains, use MCC
5200.
